GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
dmaengine: hisilicon: Add multi-thread support for a DMA channel

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit f4cee0b385cd0348e071d4d80c4c13cfe547c70d, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit e9f08b65250d73ab70e79e194813f52b8d306784. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: dmaengine: hisilicon: Add multi-thread support for a DMA channel
